name: Bink Video 2 File
summary: Learn about .BIK2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The Bink Video 2 format is developed by RAD Game Tools and was released in 2013, replacing the original Bink (.BIK) proprietary format. The format provides substantially better performance than the Bink format while maintaining high video quality.

NOTE: Bink Video 2 is available for the Windows, macOS, and Linux, Android, and iOS platforms. It is also available for Xbox One, Xbox 360, Sony PS4, Sony PS3, Sony PSVita, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Wii, and Nintendo WiiU.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
